forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, this morning greets you with the promise of a stunningly sunny day, just shy of 72 degrees. The warm embrace of the sun cuts through the briskness of the southwest winds, which dance gently, reaching upwards of 21 mph, creating a refreshing yet pleasant atmosphere. The golden hues enveloping the skyline are competing for attention with the retreating marine layer, which, while present, appears to have lifted, allowing for expansive visibility towards the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate.

As evening approaches, a gentle transition will beckon you to wrap yourself in layers, as temperatures will fall comfortably, settling around 58 degrees. The gentle west-southwest winds persist, lending a consistency that feels invigorating as twilight approaches. With such clarity and warmth, it’s a splendid day to stroll along the waterfront or lose yourself amid the vibrant streets, perhaps stopping at a local café to delight in a warm beverage while people-watching. Whether you're exploring quaint bookstores or finding a quiet corner in the park, today’s weather invites a leisurely pace, perfect for savoring the rich ambiance of this remarkable city.
